about.title: About ProHealthCalc
about.missionText: To provide free, accurate, and easy-to-use health calculators that empower individuals to make informed decisions about their health and wellness.
about.storyText: ProHealthCalc was created to make professional health calculations accessible to everyone. We believe that understanding your health metrics shouldn't require expensive software or medical expertise.
about.commitmentText: All our calculators are based on scientific research and medical standards. We prioritize accuracy, privacy, and user experience in everything we do.
about.feature1: Evidence-based calculations using scientifically validated formulas
about.feature2: Complete privacy - no data collection or storage
about.feature3: Free forever - no hidden fees or premium tiers
about.feature4: Mobile-friendly design for calculations on the go

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At ProHealthCalc, we take your privacy seriously. This policy outlines how we handle your information.
privacy.dataCollectionText: We do NOT collect, store, or transmit any personal health information you enter into our calculators. All calculations are performed locally in your browser.
privacy.analyticsText: We use Google Analytics to understand how visitors use our site. This includes anonymous data like page views, time on site, and general geographic location.
privacy.cookiesText: We use essential cookies to ensure the website functions properly. We may also use cookies for analytics purposes.
privacy.thirdPartyText: We use Google Analytics and may display advertisements through Google AdSense. These services have their own privacy policies.
privacy.changesText: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page.
privacy.contactText: If you have questions about this privacy policy, please contact us.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.acceptanceText: By accessing and using ProHealthCalc, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.
terms.medicalDisclaimerText: Our calculators are for informational and educational purposes only. They do NOT constitute medical advice and should NOT be used for diagnosis or treatment. Always consult with qualified healthcare professionals.
terms.accuracyText: While we strive for accuracy, we make no warranties about the completeness, reliability, or accuracy of our calculators. Use at your own risk.
terms.intellectualPropertyText: All content on ProHealthCalc is owned by us or our licensors and is protected by copyright laws.
terms.prohibitedUseText: You may not use our calculators for any illegal purpose or in violation of these terms.
terms.changesText: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use constitutes acceptance of modified terms.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions or feedback? We'd love to hear from you.
contact.emailDescription: Send us an email and we'll get back to you within 24-48 hours.
contact.followUsDescription: Stay updated with new calculators and health tips.

disclaimer.title: Medical Disclaimer
disclaimer.intro: Important information about using ProHealthCalc calculators.
disclaimer.warningText: The information and calculators provided on ProHealthCalc are for informational and educational purposes only. They are NOT intended to be a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment.
disclaimer.consultationText: Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified healthcare provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition. Never disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because of something you have calculated or read on this website.
disclaimer.emergencyText: If you think you may have a medical emergency, call your doctor, go to the emergency department, or call emergency services immediately.
disclaimer.accuracyText: While we strive to provide accurate calculations based on established medical formulas and research, we make no warranties about the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of the calculators.
disclaimer.liabilityText: ProHealthCalc, its owners, and contributors shall not be liable for any damages arising from the use of our calculators or reliance on the information provided.
disclaimer.variabilityText: Health metrics can vary significantly between individuals. Calculator results should be interpreted in the context of your overall health, medical history, and in consultation with healthcare professionals.
